author: Atomic Shrimp
description:
This is part 3 of a short series where I am making cider from apple juice I pressed back at the end of summer.

Here's a playlist containing all of the 2025 apple-related videos: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLk5KvJPikK01UagzfrcgGp3ObeXiJkW0j

Ingredients list for the pork stew:
1kg pork shoulder steaks
oil for frying
50g flour for dusting
1 onion
2 sticks celery
2 bay leaves
40g pearl barley
1 teaspoon dried thyme
500ml cider
1 teaspoon mustard (any mustard you like)
1 stock cube
(optional) pinch of saffron
1 can butter beans or other white beans
2 apples


Join the Atomic Shrimp official Discord server for FREE early access to videos! - https://discord.gg/atomicshrimp  
Atomic Shrimp subreddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/AtomicShrimp/
title: Making Cider (Part 3) – Racking, Bottling – a Little Taste – Pork With Cider and Apples
